resources.string:
"No bookmarks

Press menu then 'Nearby Stops map' to view a map, or 'Enter stop code' to enter a code displayed at a bus stop.

From the map view touch a stop on the map to display times, and then press menu to add a bookmark."

* Massive optimisation of map view
 * All map zoom levels now show stops.
 * Sort + truncate lists of services on map.
 * Disable "my location" on map drag, and add button to enable it.
 * Street view support.
 * Satellite/map view switch.
 * Refresh issue confirmed fixed.
